sHIVAH/:

Shivah  looked that and thought "It's the most strange Robot that 
I've meet..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS chuckles.
> 
> SS: Forget it.
> 
> He flies off.
> 
> OOC: I checked and found out LN owns him, now can
> anyone post for him sinceLN hasn't shown up for a
> while, or at least tell me where he is (I could just
> have SS carry him over his shoulder to the Pack).
> 
> --- airly2000 <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > Shivah/Kali::
> > 
> > "He serves to Infectrons..."said Shivah "accept or
> > denight what???"
> > 
> > Kali left The forthress and walked towards her
> > brother.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > Shadow Star chuckled.
> > > 
> > > SS: Nothing....for now.  You can accept or denigh
> > it,
> > > but eventually you will give your spark to me, but
> > > let's get off the subject for now.  If this
> > "Bright"
> > > is evil I can track him down, but if he is good I
> > will
> > > need directions from you.  Which side does he
> > serve?
> > > 
> > > --- airly2000 <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > > Shivah::
> > > > 
> > > > "Bright" said Shivah"He attraped my master...
> > killed
> > > > my sister, 
> > > > Alecto, and insult us... I like his head"and
> > looking
> > > > to 
> > > > shadowstar"What's your price?"
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > SS chuckled at the thought of ANY Predicon,
> > > > Decpticon,
> > > > > or Infecticon (I guess the Inferno would at
> > least
> > > > know
> > > > > all the factions) being able to resist him for
> > > > long.
> > > > > 
> > > > > SS:  Very well.  Name an enemy and you shall
> > have
> > > > his
> > > > > head in your hands to mock before the sun
> > sets.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- airly2000 <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > Shivhah:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "I just reconize as master one bot" said the
> > > > male
> > > > > > "But I'm glad that 
> > > > > > you want to join us..."
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > > > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > SS: Because you are clearly Predicons.  I
> > love
> > > > the
> > > > > > > evil that rises wherever that name comes.
> > One
> > > > day
> > > > > > you
> > > > > > > shall all call me MASTER, but that shall
> > be
> > > > when
> > > > > > > neither the Maximals nor any other bots
> > draw
> > > > > > breath
> > > > > > > except my slaves.  Until then I am ready
> > to
> > > > serve.
> > > > > > > LOLOLOLOLOL!
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- airly2000 <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > > > > > > OOC: Shivah is male, One of the
> > drakotrons
> > > > are
> > > > > > femme
> > > > > > > > and it's Kali
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Sivah:
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > said Shivah "why do you want join us?"
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > wrote:

> > a
> > > > blank
> > > > > > > > > protoform, but I know I can turn bots
> > into
> > > > my
> > > > > > dark
> > > > > > > > > transmetal slaves if they are willing
> > to
> > > > serve
> > > > > > me

> > > > > > > > > a taste of power. I can fly in black
> > > > dragon

> > > > > > > > > have a boa in addition to my regular
> > > > weapons

> > > > > > > > > allows for capturing the enemy
